content.text:
# List of awards and nominations received by Im Yoon-ah

}}
This is a list of awards and nominations received by South Korean singer and actress Im Yoon-ah. She has been the recipient of numerous awards, including four Baeksang Arts Awards, three Blue Dragon Film Awards, a Grand Bell Award, a Buil Film Award and an Asian Film Award.
__TOC__
